### Mexico and Peru

```{r  results='hide'}
annual_number_of_deaths_by_cause <- read_csv("Data/annual-number-of-deaths-by-cause.csv", 
    col_types = cols(`Number of executions` = col_double())) 

```


```{r}
Mexico_and_Peru <- annual_number_of_deaths_by_cause %>%
  filter(Country %in% c("Mexico", "Peru")) %>%
  (filter(!is.na(Code), Year >= 2005)%>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  summarise("Meningitis_total" = sum(`Meningitis`), 
            "Alzheimer's disease and other dementias_total" = sum(`Alzheimer's disease and other dementias`),
            "Parkinson's disease_total" = sum(`Parkinson's disease`),
            "Nutritional deficiencies_total" = sum(`Nutritional deficiencies`),
            "Malaria_total" = sum(`Malaria`),
            "Drowning" = sum(`Drowning`),
            "Interpersonal violence_total" = sum(`Interpersonal violence`),
            "Maternal disorders_total" = sum(`Maternal disorders`),
            "HIV/AIDS_total" = sum(`HIV/AIDS`),
            "Drug use disorders_total" = sum(`Drug use disorders`),
            "Tuberculosis_total" = sum(`Tuberculosis`),
            "Cardiovascular diseases_total" = sum(`Cardiovascular diseases`),
            "Lower respiratory infections_total" = sum(`Lower respiratory infections`),
            "Neonatal disorders_total" = sum(`Neonatal disorders`),
            "Alcohol use disorders_total" = sum(`Alcohol use disorders`),
            "Self-harm_total" = sum(`Self-harm`),
            "Exposure to forces of nature_total" = sum(`Exposure to forces of nature`),
            "Diarrheal diseases_total" = sum(`Diarrheal diseases`),
            "Environmental heat and cold exposure_total" = sum(`Environmental heat and cold exposure`),
            "Neoplasms_total" = sum(`Neoplasms`),
            "Conflict and terrorism_total" = sum(`Conflict and terrorism`),
            "Diabetes mellitus_total" = sum(`Diabetes mellitus`),
            "Chronic kidney disease_total" = sum(`Chronic kidney disease`),
            "Poisonings_total" = sum(`Poisonings`),
            "Protein-energy malnutrition_total" = sum(`Protein-energy malnutrition`),
            "Terrorism (deaths)_total" = sum(`Terrorism (deaths)`),
            "Road injuries_total" = sum(`Road injuries`),
            "Chronic respiratory diseases_total" = sum(`Chronic respiratory diseases`),
            "Cirrhosis and other chronic liver diseases_total" = sum(`Cirrhosis and other chronic liver diseases`),
            "Digestive diseases_total" = sum(`Digestive diseases`),
            "Fire, heat, and hot substances_total" = sum (`Fire, heat, and hot substances`),
            "Acute hepatitis_total" = sum(`Acute hepatitis`)
            )%>%
  head(Mexico_and_Peru, 3)
  
```
